에버그린투자파트너스(유)_서울특별시.Description: 에버그린투자파트너스(유)는 ICT, 바이오 등 다양한 분야의 기술 기반 초기 창업 기업에 투자하고 육성하는 벤처캐피탈입니다.

Medipixel, Inc._Seoul, South Korea.Description: Medipixel develops AI-based technology for the diagnosis and treatment of cardiovascular diseases, including software as a medical device (SaMD) and AI-powered robotic control for surgical procedures.

KILSA GLOBAL PTE.LTD._Singapore.Description: KILSA Global PTE. LTD. is a market entry and business management specialist firm headquartered in Singapore that helps companies, particularly tech-based ones, expand and localize in overseas markets, primarily in Southeast Asia, by providing consulting, business development, and operational support.

kaspersky_Stadtkreis 1 Altstadt.Description: Kaspersky is a cybersecurity company that develops and sells antivirus, internet security, endpoint security, and other digital threat protection products and services.

aum-vc.com_서울특별시.Description: AUM Ventures is an early and pre-growth stage venture capital fund that empowers innovative tech/tech-enabled and consumer-focused entrepreneurs, primarily in India.

d.camp_Seoul.Description: d.camp is a non-profit organization funded by Korean banks that serves as a central hub in Seoul, offering investment, workspace, and a supportive network to cultivate and accelerate the growth of early-stage startups.

금융경제연구소.Description: 금융경제연구소는 금융 정책, 산업 및 경제 전반에 대한 연구를 통해 금융 시장 발전과 금융 노동자 권익 향상에 기여하는 연구 기관입니다.

모핑아이.Description: 모핑아이는 인공지능 및 로봇 기술을 활용하여 인프라 관리 솔루션을 개발하며, 블록체인, AI, 메타버스 기술 기반의 플랫폼 서비스도 제공합니다.

배화여자대학교_서울시.Description: Baewha Women's University is a private higher education institution in Seoul, South Korea, providing a variety of academic programs primarily for women.

KB \bInvestment.Description: KB Investment is a venture capital and private equity firm that invests in companies across various sectors and stages, providing financial backing and management services.

Translink Investment (트랜스링크)_Seoul, Sout.Description: 국내외 스타트업의 글로벌 진출 및 성장을 지원하는 벤처 캐피탈 회사입니다.

초간단 물류경쟁력, 콜로세움.Description: 초간단 물류경쟁력, 콜로세움은 인공지능 기반의 풀필먼트 서비스를 통해 이커머스 셀러들의 물류 경쟁력 강화를 지원하는 기업입니다.

Skilfinity_Singapore, Singapore.Description: Skilfinity is a global full-service digital marketing, analytics, and marketing consulting company providing services like web development, SEO, social media marketing, and PPC to drive digital branding and lead generation.

첨단정보통신융합산업기술원_Daegu.Description: 첨단정보통신융합산업기술원은 첨단 정보통신 기술과 다양한 산업의 융합을 통해 기술 개발, 상용화 및 지역 기업 지원을 수행하는 연구 및 지원 기관입니다.

울산대학교_Ulsan.Description: Ulsan University is a private comprehensive university in Ulsan, South Korea, providing a wide range of higher education programs.

경기창조경제혁신센터_South Korea.Description: 경기창조경제혁신센터는 스타트업의 발굴, 육성, 투자 유치 및 글로벌 진출 등을 지원하여 창조경제 실현에 기여하는 재단법인입니다.

K-GROUND VENTURES_South Korea.Description: K-GROUND VENTURES is a South Korea-based venture capital firm that invests in technology startups, primarily in Series B funding rounds.

SparkLabs Global_Palo Alto, South Korea.Description: SparkLabs Global Ventures is a venture capital firm headquartered in Palo Alto, California, United States, focusing on seed-stage investments in global startups.

내경엔지니어링_안양시.Description: 내경엔지니어링 provides comprehensive engineering services including urban planning, civil engineering design, construction management, impact assessments, and architectural design, with a strong focus on infrastructure projects like roads and highways.

아워박스_South Korea.Description: 아워박스 provides integrated e-commerce fulfillment services, handling logistics from storage to delivery.

세종벤처파트너스_South Korea.Number_of_employee: Information not available for this specific entity
세종벤처파트너스_South Korea.Description: 세종벤처파트너스 is a venture capital firm that invests in startup and venture companies, with a focus on sectors such as biotechnology and ICT, and manages venture funds.

KOISRA Seed Partners_Seoul, South Korea.Description: KOISRA Seed Partners is a Korean-Israeli seed fund and mentorship-driven accelerator focused on transforming Korean startups into global successes by providing funding, mentoring, and networking opportunities.

신한DS_Seoul.Description: Shinhan DS is a financial IT specialized company providing digital transformation, system integration, information security, and IT consulting services.

호패_Seoul, South Korea.Description: Hopae is a digital identity startup that provides secure and instant identity verification solutions using Decentralized Identity (DID) technology.

ZISHEL GROUP_GANGNAM-GU, South Korea.Description: ZISHEL GROUP researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and distributes medical technologies for plastic and aesthetic purposes.

대구 · 경북지방중소벤처기업청_South Korea.Description: 대구 · 경북지방중소벤처기업청 is a South Korean government agency that plans, coordinates, and implements policies and support programs for the growth, protection, and fostering of small and medium-sized enterprises and venture businesses in the Daegu and Gyeongbuk regions.

와이즈넛_성남.Description: 와이즈넛은 인공지능 챗봇, 빅데이터 수집/분석, 검색 솔루션 등 AI 및 빅데이터 기술을 활용하여 기업 및 기관에 소프트웨어 및 서비스를 제공하는 기업입니다.

mobydickam.com_Seoul.Description: Mobydick Asset Management is an asset management firm headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Vensa_Auckland.Description: Vensa Health provides a digital health platform and messaging solutions connecting patients and healthcare providers for services like online bookings, repeat prescriptions, and health reminders.

KNT Investment Co., Ltd._Seoul.Description: KNT Investment is a Cross Border Private Equity firm based in Seoul that invests in promising companies with technology and potential in South Korea, Southeast Asia, and North America, with a focus on global biotech companies.

정보통신산업진흥원.Description: 정보통신산업진흥원(NIPA)은 ICT 및 소프트웨어 산업의 경쟁력 강화와 성장을 지원하고 디지털 혁신을 촉진하여 대한민국 경제 발전과 국민 삶의 질 향상에 기여하는 기관입니다.
